revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Shiny Charm |image = [[File:Bag_Shiny_Charm_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Shiny Charm''. |dex = 70 |effect = Encounter shinies more often }} The '''Shiny Charm''' is a type of Oak item. When equipped, it increases the probability of encountering a shiny Pokémon. == Details == ===Description=== Encounter shinies more often ===Acquisition=== Catch 70 Unique Pokémon. ===Effects=== Level 0: x1.5 Shiny Chance, Level 1: x1.6 Shiny Chance, Level 2: x1.7 Shiny Chance, Level 3: x1.8 Shiny Chance, Level 4: x1.9 Shiny Chance, Level 5/MAX: x2.0 Shiny Chance, ===Upgrade Requirements=== Level 0 to 1 4 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 50,000 Pokedollars Level 1 to 2 4 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 100,000 Pokedollars Level 2 to 3 10 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 250,000 Pokedollars Level 3 to 4 17 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 500,000 Pokedollars Level 4 to 5 34 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 1,000,000 Pokedollars {{Oak items}}
[[Category:Oak Items]] [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Shinies]]

{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Shiny Charm |image = [[File:Bag_Shiny_Charm_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Shiny Charm''. |dex = 70 |effect = Encounter shinies more often }} The '''Shiny Charm''' is a type of Oak item. When equipped, it increases the probability of encountering a shiny Pokémon. == Details == ===Description=== Encounter shinies more often ===Acquisition=== Catch 70 Unique Pokémon. ===Effects=== Level 0: x1.5 Shiny Chance, Level 1: x1.6 Shiny Chance, Level 2: x1.7 Shiny Chance, Level 3: x1.8 Shiny Chance, Level 4: x1.9 Shiny Chance, Level 5/MAX: x2.0 Shiny Chance, ===Upgrade Requirements=== Level 0 to 1 4 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 50,000 Pokedollars Level 1 to 2 4 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 100,000 Pokedollars Level 2 to 3 ?? seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 250,000 Pokedollars Level 3 to 4 17 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 500,000 Pokedollars Level 4 to 5 34 seen [[Category:Shinies]] and 1,000,000 Pokedollars {{Oak items}}
